index.title: Julian Klummer | Fullstack Developer based in Berlin
index.description: Als Fullstack-Entwickler bin ich darauf spezialisiert, mit TypeScript und JAMstack-Technologien ansprechende digitale Anwendungen zu entwickeln. Von React über Nextjs bis hin zu Node und anderen wichtigen Tools verfüge ich über das Know-how, um Visionen zum Leben zu erwecken. Da ich mich auf kontinuierliches Lernen konzentriere, bin ich immer auf der Suche nach den neuesten Tools und Techniken, um innovative Lösungen zu erschaffen.

hero.headline: Julian Klummer
hero.subline: Ambitious fullstack developer specialized on TypeScript

about.text: My journey into the world of coding and digital media began at the age of 13 when I developed my first photography blog and experimented with it. This project sparked my fascination for websites that stand out through beautiful designs and interesting user interfaces. In my bachelor's studies in Stuttgart, I explored the extensive field of online media in numerous dimensions. My academic education covered a wide spectrum, from basic IT skills to advanced concepts such as application development, machine learning, and the Internet of Things. Additionally, I honed my skills in management, project leadership, and competency in multimedia environments.During my studies, I expanded my skills through work in my entrepreneurial venture in event and brand management and a working student job as a frontend developer.Through entrepreneurship, I learned graphic design and content creation for web platforms, maintaining web shops, and ticketing systems. I particularly trained in creating good processes, effective team communication, decisive action, and balancing conflicting interests.My time in frontend development gave me a deeper understanding of the intricacies of programming and web architecture. In particular, my involvement in various projects at the SIRUP agency acquainted me with a variety of technologies and expanded my knowledge spectrum.The different tech stacks present many challenges for API integration, server-client synchronization, and bundling. I proactively took on this task, maintaining and integrating tools and modules to enable both the best possible user and developer experience.I aim to optimize processes and develop efficiently. Adhering to the DRY principle (Don't Repeat Yourself), I prioritize clean, reusable code encapsulated and documented within packages. Furthermore, I stay up to date on new technologies, best practices, and design patterns, and I'm happy to share my knowledge to advance my environment and enable the adoption of innovation.One of my favorite recent challenges was implementing a headless CMS for a Next.js integration. With my expertise in backend development with TypeScript, Node, Koa, and Strapi, we successfully realized a robust system and implemented a search API with Elasticsearch.
